mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN (SIGN_ID, plan_id,details_id, TERM_ID, course_id, course_name, term, PERSON_ID,DEPT_ID, creator, create_time, create_dept,VALID_FLAG) VALUES (#{signId}, #{planId}, #{detailsId}, #{termId}, #{courseId}, #{courseName}, #{term}, #{personId}, #{deptId}, #{creator}, sysdate, #{createDept},'0')
mapper.update: UPDATE T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN SET term = #{term} , changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate, change_dept= #{changeDept} WHERE SIGN_ID= #{signId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.sign_id signId , t.details_id detailsId, FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t.plan_id, 'T_JW_COURSEPLAN', 'PLAN_ID', 'PLAN_NAME') planId , FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(m.term,'KKJHXQ') termId , t.course_id courseId,t.course_name courseName, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.term,'XQ') term, FUNC_GET_USERNAME(t.person_id ) personId, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(t.dept_id) deptId ,t.term termValue FROM T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN t , T_JW_COURSEPLAN_TERM m WHERE t.term_id = m.id AND t.sign_id = #{signId}

select m.sign_id signId, t.DEPARTMENTS_ID departmentsId, t.major_code majorCode, t.major_direction majorDirection, t.training_level trainingLevel from T_JW_COURSE t,T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN m where t.course_id = m.course_id and m.sign_id = #{signId}
mapper.insert: insert INTO T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN_CLASS (id,sign_id,departments_id,MAJOR_CODE,MAJOR_DIRECTION,TRAINING_LEVEL,CLASS_ID,CREATOR,CREATE_TIME,CREATE_DEPT,VALID_FLAG) SELECT #{id} id,#{signId} sign_id, t.departments_Id,t.major_code,t.major_direction,t.training_level,t.class_id, #{creator} CREATOR,sysdate CREATE_TIME,#{createDept} CREATE_DEPT,'1' FROM T_XG_CLASS t WHERE t.CLASS_ID=#{classId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN_CLASS SET class_id = #{classId} , changer= #{changer}, change_time= sysdate, change_dept= #{changeDept} WHERE SIGN_ID= #{signId}
mapper.select: SELECT DEPARTMENTS_ID id, FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(DEPARTMENTS_ID) name, '' pid FROM T_JW_COURSEPLAN where PLAN_ID = #{id} UNION SELECT distinct d.major_code id, d.major_name name, d.departments_id pId FROM T_XG_MAJOR d , T_JW_COURSEPLAN jj WHERE d.valid_flag = 1 and jj.major_code = d.major_code and jj.major_direction = d.major_direction and jj.training_level = d.training_level and jj.PLAN_ID = #{id} UNION SELECT distinct cc.class_id id, cc.class_name name, cc.major_code pid FROM t_xg_class cc, T_JW_COURSEPLAN jj WHERE cc.valid_flag = 1 and cc.major_code = cc.major_code and jj.major_code = cc.major_code and jj.major_direction = cc.major_direction and jj.training_level = cc.training_level and jj.PLAN_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN SET class_id = (select wmsys.wm_concat(t.class_id) as class_id from T_JW_COURSEPLAN_SIGN_CLASS t where t.sign_id = #{signId}) WHERE sign_id = #{signId}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM T_JW_ARRAYCLASS_COURSEPLAN WHERE PLAN_ID = #{id}
